context.title: Changelog for Rule: ARIA state or property is permitted
context.changelog:
[{"date":"2020-05-21T10:38:07Z","message":"ARIA state/prop permitted: Remove "attribute" from expectation (#1313)

The expectation should not talk about attributes when the expectation calls it "state or property". The formulation is a little outdated, fixing that solves this issue.

Co-authored-by: Jey Nandakumar <jey.nandakumar@gmail.com>","sha":"6e28130bc8de5c273d1dd7d74e96b9fd9aaeeb76","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/6e28130bc8de5c273d1dd7d74e96b9fd9aaeeb76"},{"date":"2020-04-28T12:35:20Z","message":"Handling Presentational role conflict resolution (#1189)

* Add rest of mappings to techniques","sha":"09a6befae88804b0ed2962bcb9039de712ae03df","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/09a6befae88804b0ed2962bcb9039de712ae03df"},{"date":"2020-03-11T15:27:02Z","message":"fix: spelling of `acknowledgment` in rules frontmatter & update… (#1223)","sha":"03cdc4deead55b1759a5de97fdd34f23e62a57a2","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/03cdc4deead55b1759a5de97fdd34f23e62a57a2"},{"date":"2020-03-09T08:45:37Z","message":"Improve example descriptions of "ARIA state or property is permitted" (5c01ea) (#1179)

* Add SVG example","sha":"92db8199832bf6d17de40c77cf3dc6fe91f1892d","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/92db8199832bf6d17de40c77cf3dc6fe91f1892d"},{"date":"2019-10-29T17:40:59Z","message":"feat: allow `acknowledgements` & `previous_authors` in rule frontmatter. (#997)","sha":"72aa4e58e3c820e945e22e9797964047bb7aec35","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/72aa4e58e3c820e945e22e9797964047bb7aec35"},{"date":"2019-09-25T12:19:57Z","message":"Updating rule name(s) and filename(s) (#943)","sha":"4e85f969664aa3439075967c481db6bfc1ea86c6","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/4e85f969664aa3439075967c481db6bfc1ea86c6"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"5c01ea","name":"ARIA state or property is permitted","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that WAI-ARIA states or properties are allowed for the element they are specified on.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag-technique:ARIA5":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"aria11:state_property_processing":{"title":"ARIA 1.1, 7.6 State and Property Attribute Processing","forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"satisfied","inapplicable":"satisfied"}},"input_aspects":["Accessibility Tree","CSS styling","DOM Tree"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Anne Thyme Nørregaard","Jean-Yves Moyen"]}}
